The '''etho slab''' is a joke [[slab]] introduced exclusively in [[Java Edition 2.0]]. Its name is a reference to the [[YouTube]] channel [https://www.youtube.com/user/EthosLab EthosLab].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Unlike normal [[TNT]], etho slabs do not break instantly{{Verify}}

{{breaking row|Etho Slab|horizontal=5}}

=== Crafting ===
{{Crafting
|ignoreusage=1
|A2=TNT
|B2=TNT
|C2=TNT
|Output=Etho Slab,6
}}

== Usage ==
Etho slabs behave like TNT, with the only difference being that on explosion there is a 25% chance that it will spawn a [[Anvil#Falling anvils|falling anvil]] one block above the nearest [[player]] in a 20 block radius, which is a reference to EthosLab's fondness in pranking his friends with a falling anvil.

When flashing white it appears bugged.
